trigger.expression: {Template IPMI Supermicro X9SRI-F:ipmi.system.5vcc.last(#1)}<4.576 or {Template IPMI Supermicro X9SRI-F:ipmi.system.5vcc.last(#1)}>5.344
trigger.name: +5 V Critical [{ITEM.VALUE}] on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template IPMI Supermicro X9SRI-F:ipmi.system.12v.last(#1)}<10.706 or {Template IPMI Supermicro X9SRI-F:ipmi.system.12v.last(#1)}>13.091
trigger.name: +12 V Critical [{ITEM.VALUE}] on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template IPMI Supermicro X9SRI-F:ipmi.system.avcc.last(#1)}<2.944 or {Template IPMI Supermicro X9SRI-F:ipmi.system.avcc.last(#1)}>3.584
trigger.name: AVCC Critical [{ITEM.VALUE}] on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template IPMI Supermicro X9SRI-F:ipmi.system.temp.last(#1)}<-5.000 or {Template IPMI Supermicro X9SRI-F:ipmi.system.temp.last(#1)}>80.000
trigger.name: System Temp Critical [{ITEM.VALUE}] on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template IPMI Supermicro X9SRI-F:ipmi.system.vbat.last(#1)}<2.944 or {Template IPMI Supermicro X9SRI-F:ipmi.system.vbat.last(#1)}>3.584
trigger.name: VBAT Critical [{ITEM.VALUE}] on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template IPMI Supermicro X9SRI-F:ipmi.system.vcore.last(#1)}<0.544 or {Template IPMI Supermicro X9SRI-F:ipmi.system.vcore.last(#1)}>1.488
trigger.name: Vcore Critical [{ITEM.VALUE}] on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template IPMI Supermicro X9SRI-F:ipmi.system.vdimm.last(#1)}<1.280 or {Template IPMI Supermicro X9SRI-F:ipmi.system.vdimm.last(#1)}>1.760
trigger.name: VDIMM Critical [{ITEM.VALUE}] on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template IPMI Supermicro X9SRI-F:ipmi.system.vsb.last(#1)}<2.944 or {Template IPMI Supermicro X9SRI-F:ipmi.system.vsb.last(#1)}>3.584
trigger.name: VSB Critical [{ITEM.VALUE}] on {HOST.NAME}
